hero.title: DynamicOps – Automation without the smoke and mirrors
hero.subtitle: We transform repetitive tasks into automatic processes. If you're doing it by hand, you're already late: we'll do it for you.

services.title: Our Automation Solutions
services.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive suite of automation services designed to streamline your operations and drive growth.

service1.title: Frictionless Time-Tracking
service1.description:
Each employee clocks in with a link or QR code.

You get ready-to-go reports by location, team, and date without a single spreadsheet cell.

Ready to send to your accountant or HR.

service2.title: Automatic File Sorting & Secure Backup
service2.description:
Your documents sort themselves by date, client, or type.

Automatic backups to a drive or the cloud without lifting a finger.

Perfect for shared drives or historical chaos.

service3.title: Digital Tracking of Internal Orders or Requests
service3.description:
A digital form for supplies, transfers, support, or whatever you need.

Reports by month, person, or area.

Replaces email, WhatsApp, or paper trails.

service1.title: Data Capture from WhatsApp or Social Media
service1.description:
We automatically extract what your customers type (name, order, address).

We save it in an organized, exportable table.

Automatic replies to confirm or thank them.

service2.title: Digital Sales or Service Logging by Location
service2.description:
Log every sale or service from a phone or tablet.

Instantly centralized data for daily or weekly reports.

No need for expensive systems or complex inventories.

service3.title: Automatic Follow-Up with Frequent Customers
service3.description:
Get alerts for customers who haven't returned in X days.

Send reminders, promotions, or personalized messages.

Ideal for salons, workshops, clinics, or stores.

service1.title: Automatic Calculation of Key Indicators
service1.description:
Total sales, best-selling products, profits, visits.

Ready daily or weekly without formulas or emails.

Delivered in Excel or PDF.

service2.title: Automatic Expense or Performance Reports
service2.description:
You upload your data (expenses, revenue, operations), and the system does the rest.

Clear balance sheets, percentages, alerts, and summaries.

Ready to share with partners or accountants.

service3.title: Weekly Consolidation of Activities or Achievements
service3.description:
Each team logs what they've done -> the system creates a visual report.

Useful for presentations, progress updates, or team management.

Updates itself, every week.

service1.title: Automatic Scanning of Equipment (Windows/Linux)
service1.description:
Detects suspicious tasks, unauthorized software, or large/insecure files.

Informs the technical team with alerts or weekly reports.

Requires no agents or permanent installation.

service2.title: Scheduled Cleaning of Files or Folders
service2.description:
Automates the secure deletion of old or duplicate files.

Applies rules by type, date, or folder.

Prevents storage overload or misuse.

service3.title: Automation of Manual Processes with Scripts
service3.description:
Tasks you do every day (exporting, copying, moving, renaming) are scheduled to run on their own.

Saves time, zero errors, more efficiency.
